section_hero.title_3: I build amazing websites and applications
section_hero.final_paragraph: I am a front-end web developer and Bachelor in Information Technologies, committed to designing exceptional digital experiences and bringing creative ideas to life in web environments.

section_about.title: About Me
section_about.paragraph_1: Hello, my name is Miguel, I am a front-end developer, however, I also have some knowledge in back-end.
section_about.paragraph_2: I decided to focus more on front-end because it allows me to work on what I enjoy the most: the user interface. I like to create something visual that comes to life.
section_about.paragraph_3: I studied a Bachelor's degree in Information Technologies. During that time, I was not yet clear about my professional path, but after taking some web development classes, I discovered my interest in that area.
section_about.paragraph_4: I am constantly learning new topics and practicing what I already know. Whenever I work on my projects, I try to apply best practices in the code and maintain the highest possible performance of the website or web application.
section_about.paragraph_5: These are some of the technologies I have worked with:

actividades: I worked on the development and maintenance of e-commerce platforms like Shopify and WordPress
I redesigned and optimized clients' websites
I provided technical support to clients
Development of modules for the company's administrative system
Design and programming of a virtual store for buying and selling school uniforms
Development and maintenance of modules for the Academic Load System (SISCAP)
Maintenance and improvements of modules for the Attendance Control System (time clock)

project_santamar.title: Landing Page - Santamar
project_santamar.description: It is a landing page that I previously developed in Wordpress for a real estate company but decided to replicate in React

project_app_gastos.title: Personal Expense Application
project_app_gastos.description: It is an application to manage personal expenses, the application allows you to record each expense, the category, description, cost, and date. When registering the expense, it is possible to access a list with each registered expense and also a list of expenses by category. The application uses Firebase for the backend and React for the front-end, and it includes user authentication.

project_prepa.title: Virtual Store - Preparatoria Dos UADY
project_prepa.description: It is a virtual store for selling school uniforms that I developed during my stay at Preparatoria Dos

section_contact.title: Contact
section_contact.paragraph: I am excited about the possibility of new job opportunities. You can contact me through the following form or reach out to me on my social networks below. I hope we can collaborate soon!

field_name.max: The name must be at most 70 characters long

field_subject.max: The subject must be at most 300 characters long
